content: Create main /user:setup-laravel command with project detection logic
Implement project analysis system (Laravel version, packages, frontend stack detection)
Generate adaptive permission system with security-first approach
Build 15 Laravel-specific slash commands (feature generation, optimization, security, testing)
Set up advanced directory structure with templates and workflows
Create team collaboration configuration system (shared vs local settings)
Generate comprehensive documentation and setup guides
Implement validation and testing system for generated setup
Create maintenance and update scripts for ongoing management
